org.simplity.kernel.data

Class CommonData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.kernel.data.CommonData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonDataInterface, FieldsInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServiceContext

    public class CommonData
extends Object
implements CommonDataInterface
    Default generic data structure that is created for implementing a service. We would encourage sub-classing this rather than having this as an attribute.
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Field Detail

      • NOT_APPLICABLE

        protected static final int NOT_APPLICABLE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • allFields

        protected final Map<String,Value> allFields
        generally temp and work related fields that are created during an algorithm, and are not part of any record. These fields are addressed with just field name with no qualifier

      • allSheets

        protected final Map<String,DataSheet> allSheets
        data sheets. a given data sheet may be either a SingleRowSheet or DataSheet

      • iteratedSheets

        protected final Map<String,CommonData.SheetIterator> iteratedSheets
        sheets that are currently being iterated. Iteration over single-row sheet is dummy, and is simulated, and hence is never put into this list

      • allObjects

        protected final Map<String,Object> allObjects
        in java-class intensive projects, objects like DAO, DTO are used for data So, let us carry them as well.

      • startIteration

        public final DataSheetIterator startIteration(String sheetName)
                                       throws AlreadyIteratingException
        Description copied from interface: CommonDataInterface
        get an iterator on this sheet. Only one iterator could be active at any point. Caller has to carefully design iteration to avoid nested iteration on the same sheet. Also, caller must ensure that the iteration is cancelled in case the iteration is not completed. Run time error is thrown on any attempt start iteration on a sheet that is already in the middle of an iteration.
        Specified by:
        startIteration in interface CommonDataInterface
        Returns:
        iterator instance for looping on each row of this sheet
        Throws:
        AlreadyIteratingException - if this sheet is in the middle of an iteration (earlier one is neither completed, not cancelled)

      • getAllFields

        public Set<Map.Entry<String,Value>> getAllFields()
        Specified by:
        getAllFields in interface FieldsInterface
        Returns:
        an iterator for accessing all fields as an entry of name-value for current row
